message:
If you are interested in trading civic mobile app marketing tips, after I tour the National Palace on Tuesday afternoon, we could connect.

I've launched one of the top rated Android apps to listen to radio news in English from all over the world: http://1radionews.com

Breaking out with a public good app is a challenge and I am interested in what others have done to boost use and awareness.

Soon I will be adding some on-demand shows from ICRT and RTI from Taiwan as well. :-)

Just post here that you are interested in sharing geek marketing lessons. If there is enough interest, we can arrange a small gathering at a cafe.
story: Steven Clift shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: 1 Radio News - Listen to radio news via Android app. Hourly news on-demand. Live world news, talk, and culture radio in English.
name: The News Radio App - 1 Radio News
caption: 1radionews.com
